name: Platformer.txt
description:
you can subscribe to this newsletter to follow the developement of the game https://tinyletter.com/Platformertxt

A game made for the ludum dare 43 by KIEFFER Hugo EDERY Ruben & LAMBRECK Léonard with the theme "Sacrifices must be made"

Platformer.txt is a game where you manipulate files to influence the state of the game and your avatar in order to complete the different levels, if you like the game please tell me, it is possible that I will make a real game of it in the future
